column4: i have a folder called 'pictures' in my home folder.   what's the best way to share that folder with read/write access to multiple user accounts on this same machine?
create a common group, and set group permissions on the directory and all of its files
will i have to set permissions on every file added going forward?
I believe you can set the sgid bit on your pictures directory to get each new file created in that directory to be under the same group
